dcterms:creator: F. Liu
C. Masouros
A. P. Petropulu
H. Griffiths
L. Hanzo
dcterms:description: The Cramer-Rao Lower Bound (CRLB) is used to characterize the estimation accuracy in the context of integrated sensing and communication (ISAC) systems.
dcterms:title: Cramer-Rao Lower Bound (CRLB)

dcterms:creator: A. Liu
dcterms:description: The Integrated Sensing and Communication (ISAC) dataset provides insights into the fundamental limits of ISAC systems, focusing on the co-design of sensing and communication functionalities.
dcterms:title: Integrated Sensing and Communication (ISAC)

dcterms:creator: O. B. Akan
M. Arik
dcterms:description: The Dual Function Radar-Communication dataset explores the capabilities of systems that can perform both radar sensing and communication without the need for separate signaling.
dcterms:title: Dual Function Radar-Communication

dcterms:creator: H. Wymeersch
G. Seco-Granados
G. Destino
D. Dardari
F. Tufvesson
dcterms:description: The mmWave Positioning dataset focuses on positioning techniques in vehicular networks using millimeter wave technology.
dcterms:title: mmWave Positioning

dcterms:creator: S. Kuutti
S. Fallah
K. Katsaros
M. Dianati
F. McCullough
A. Mouzakitis
dcterms:description: The Localization Techniques for Autonomous Vehicles dataset surveys various localization techniques and their applications in autonomous vehicles.
dcterms:title: Localization Techniques for Autonomous Vehicles

dcterms:creator: Z. Feng
Z. Fang
Z. Wei
X. Chen
Z. Quan
D. Ji
dcterms:description: The Joint Radar and Communication dataset provides a comprehensive overview of the integration of radar and communication systems.
dcterms:title: Joint Radar and Communication

dcterms:creator: Z. Xiao
Y. Zeng
dcterms:description: The Integrated Localization and Communication dataset provides an overview of the integration of localization and communication technologies towards 6G.
dcterms:title: Integrated Localization and Communication

dcterms:creator: M. Roberton
E. Brown
dcterms:description: The Chirp Signals for Radar and Communication dataset explores the use of chirped spread-spectrum techniques for integrated radar and communication systems.
dcterms:title: Chirp Signals for Radar and Communication

dcterms:creator: Z. Xu
A. Petropulu
dcterms:description: The OFDM Waveforms for Dual Function Radar Communication dataset investigates the use of OFDM waveforms in dual-function radar communication systems.
dcterms:title: OFDM Waveforms for Dual Function Radar Communication

dcterms:creator: S. Sen
A. Nehorai
dcterms:description: The Adaptive OFDM Radar dataset focuses on adaptive OFDM radar techniques for target detection in multipath scenarios.
dcterms:title: Adaptive OFDM Radar
